title: Web Application Development with Laravel
about: Learn to develop great web applications using one of the most popular open source PHP framework. Laravel has become one of the hottest frameworks and a sought after skill for PHP developers. Its clean and elegant syntax coupled with the powerful toolkit makes it an ideal choice for modern web developers. This powerful technology boast of features such as clean routing, elegant queue library, ORM ,simple authentication and a large developer community.
